page.title: 13The Parish Church
page.content: The{parish priest}lives at the Rectory on Vicarage Hill, Petham. He serves a{group of Church of England {churches}including the three churches at Petham, Lower Hardres and Upper Hardres covered by the survey. Weekly services are held at the Churches. At Petham this means a morning service alternating with an evening service. There is a choir which leads the singing and a group of bellringers. In addition to his commitments to take the services and sacraments in the churches, Rev R. Love, the present incumbent, takes a weekly morning assembly in the local Primary Schools.
